issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
{html}

3gt ipod touch (4.0.2) TiMobile 1.5.0.faa27c7. Not repro'ing on 4th gen touch

1.Phone > Sound > record
2.hi def or no, start recording with headphones plugged in
3.unplug, replug and hit stop

results:

fields.summary: iOS: Sound crash when unplugging then plugging headphones back in  (3gt ipod touch only)

comments.body: Resolving ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported.
